- Memories are also part of a successful vacation. Thanks to Yuge, you can retrieve all the photos and videos taken on the ski area's photo spots, so that you can share them with your friends, family or colleagues back at the office!
- Looking for thrills or just a moment of relaxation? Find all your information during your stay: activities to try, shops, events ...

And don't forget to activate the notifications so you don't miss anything! There are so many things to discover in the resort...
